page.title: 20Housing Droxford a Resident
page.content: Oldest House 500 years;newest being built.34 council houses 6 old peoples bungalows.Old cottages knocked to_ gether make larger homes.New development? workhouse site? In fields hedges have been uprooted and trees felled for the combines.Average journey to work is 15 miles. {On}19th July I visited a lady who is 84 years old.She has lived in her present house for 55 years alone for 40 She would like proper drains She goes to Golden Age meetings in village hall She says Droxford is a very nice place to live.She travels round by bus She has lots of friends and meets at least one every day.{1086}Drochenford (thought to be Saxon word to do with water){1985}Droxford provides a rich source of material for the social, emotional,moral and educ. development of the children of{Droxford C.P School
